articles.title: 'End Israeli Apartheid': Thousands galvanise across Europe to back Palestinians - IOL
articles.description: Protesters marched in support of Palestinians on Saturday in major European cities including London, Berlin, Madrid and Paris, as the worst violence in years raged between Israel and militants in Gaza. #PalestineBleeding
articles.content:
by Callum Paton and AFP bureaus

articles.title: EU on brink: Sweden's 'mourning' for UK after Brexit 'could quickly morph' into divorce - Daily Express
articles.description: THE EUROPEAN UNION was under threat after a political commentator warned Sweden's 'mourning' for the UK over Brexit 'could quickly morph' into the country's own divorce from Brussels.
